hero.title: Saketham Hindu Litigants Trust
hero.subtitle: We ensure that all the properties that belongs to the Deities are not mismanaged, encroached or misused.

quote.translation: Whatever the deity has, all that is for deity only.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Legally, Hindu Deities are considered to be a perpetual minor, and hence their properties cannot be transferred to anyone else. The goal of Saketham Hindu Litigants Trust is to ensure that all the properties that belong to the Deities are not mismanaged, encroached or misused and also assist with the well-being of Hindus including conducting cases related to Hindu society and religion, both spiritual and material including temple-related issues both legal and allied.

seva.title: Our Seva Offerings
seva.offering1Desc: Help and support all the Devaswom administrations and its functionaries of the Hindu temples to protect and preserve the properties.
seva.offering2Desc: Secure and safeguard the adobes of the deities from alienations and attachments by any individuals, firms, corporations, groups, etc with an arriere-pensee.
seva.offering3Desc: Legally stand behind for the well being of the Hindus including conducting cases relating to Hindu society, religion both spiritual and material including temple related issues both legal and allied.

courtCases.title: Court Cases
courtCases.description: Access detailed information about ongoing court cases, legal documents, and case status updates. Our comprehensive case management system provides transparency and easy access to legal proceedings.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: Your gift towards this good cause will go a long way in reviving properties that belongs to Deities and bringing back the sanctity those sacred places deserve. So, any small gift from your end will be treated like as seva to the Temple Hundi of the Deities to take care of the Deities itself.
